segments.text: Excuse me , but can you tell me the way to the railway station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just go straight along this street , turn left at the first crossing and walk straight ahead about 100 meters . You can ’ t miss it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About how long will it take me to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s about 20 minutes ’ walk , I think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Is there a bus I can take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can take the No . 5 bus over there . Get off at the next stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you so much for your help .
segments.speaker: S1
